      • addProxyListener

      • addConnectionRequestProxyListener

        public void addConnectionRequestProxyListener(ConnectRequestProxyListener listener)
        Adds the given ConnectRequestProxyListener to the extension hook, to be later notified of CONNECT requests received by the local proxy.

        By default, the ConnectRequestProxyListeners added are removed from the local proxy when the extension is unloaded.

        Parameters:
        listener - the ConnectRequestProxyListener that will be added and then notified
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given listener is null.
        Since:
        2.5.0

      • addSessionListener

        public void addSessionListener(SessionChangedListener listener)

      • addSiteMapListner

public void addSiteMapListner(SiteMapListener listener)
        Deprecated. Replaced by the method addSiteMapListener(SiteMapListener). It will be removed in a future release.

      • addAddOnInstallationStatusListener

        public void addAddOnInstallationStatusListener(AddOnInstallationStatusListener listener)
        Adds the given listener to the extension hook, to be later notified of changes in the installation status of the add-ons.
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener that will be added and then notified
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the given listener is null.
        Since:
        2.5.0

      • addContextDataFactory

        public void addContextDataFactory(ContextDataFactory contextDataFactory)
        Adds the given ContextDataFactory to the extension hook, to be later added to the Model.

        By default, the ContextDataFactorys added are removed from the Model when the extension is unloaded.

        Parameters:
        contextDataFactory - the ContextDataFactory that will be added to the Model
        Since:
        2.5.0
